ThingDef.label: peacock egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized peacock egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a peacock. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: peacock egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized peacock egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: quail egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized quail egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: quail egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized quail egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a quail. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: swan egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized swan egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: swan egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized swan egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby swan. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
